@ZeusTheta: Are you using Windows? I know that happens if you use Linux with WINE, but it shouldn't happen on Windows.

@Lizard4231: try extracting all of it to a folder.

Notice: 
1: You can only save when it says that you can
2: When a sentence it long then it simply cuts in the end, this has rogue-translator (the guy who translated this on his own) said is "unavoidable"
3: With applocale choose the file with "browse", no arguments, "mon_que.exe", next, choose the language furthest down, three symbols, the first one should be two boxes on each other.
4: This game is from japan (duh), and as such it's censured because it's ILLEGAL to draw a vagina there if I'm not wrong.
5: If you ask 4chan's /d/ (hentai alternative) about the game, they usually pick up and as long as you post pictures you can ask for hints, saves or really anything.
6: Chapter two will come out... In... 1-2 months from now AS EARLIEST!!! This means that it probably will take more than that.
